function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of natural ventilation and reliance on artificial environmental conditions","Impact":"Increase in sick building syndrome, chronic diseases, and allergies","Mitigation":"Adopting natural ventilation and passive design principles","Technologies":"Passive design principles, building morphology, passive urban approach","People":"Building occupants","Owner":"Architectural engineers and urban designers"},{"Description":"High levels of pollution without adequate disinfection and purification processes","Impact":"Risk of disease outbreaks and health issues","Mitigation":"Adopting adequate disinfection and purification processes","Technologies":"Disinfection and purification technologies","People":"Population in areas with high pollution levels","Owner":"Local authorities and public health organizations"}]}
